attributes.action: Legislate NO MASK NO ENTRY in all stores, businesses and indoor establishments.
attributes.additional_details:
After having worked in a bakery over the last two lockdowns, I have encountered many people who do not “believe” in the virus, refuse to wear one, “forget”, put their jumper over their nose or walk in without one and put it on inside which defeats the objective.

Beliefs and forgetfulness do not protect people from a deadly virus- nor does it help enforce the severity of the virus effecting us all. 
Beliefs and forgetfulness do not stop you from transmitting and spreading a virus.
attributes.background: Legislate a NO MASK NO ENTRY (or provide proof of exemption) in all stores, businesses and indoor establishments to stop any further negligence against the covid pandemic.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already the law that face coverings must be worn in shops unless exempt. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
